MS MCQs

    Deploy Spring microservices to Azure - Build a Spring Boot microservice

    »

    1. To deploy a Spring Boot microservice to Azure Spring Cloud, what do you need to change in your application?

      Code a specific Spring bean

      Add a specific Maven dependency

      Set up some specific environment variables

      None of the above


    2. By default, how can you access your microservice once it is deployed?

      There is a specific, secured endpoint, where the application is published

      There is a publicly available endpoint

      The endpoint is not available at all on the Internet, you must use a private network to access it
